com.quantcomponents.algo
Interface ITradingAgent

All Superinterfaces:
IManagedRunnable, IOrderStatusListener, IPositionListener, ISeriesProcessor<Date,Double>, Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AverageCrossingTradingAgent
public interface ITradingAgent
extends ISeriesProcessor<Date,Double>, IManagedRunnable, IOrderStatusListener, IPositionListener

Trading algorithm instance Instances are created by implementors of ITradingAgentFactory, and are operated by means of a hierarchy of handles.

See Also:
ITradingHierarchyManager, ITradingManager, IManagedRunnable

setOrderReceiver

void setOrderReceiver(IOrderReceiver orderReceiver)
Set the execution service before starting the algorithm

Parameters:
orderReceiver - an execution service

inputComplete

void inputComplete()
Communicates to the trading algorithm that the input is terminated. Method useful when simulating, to finalise the status of the agent, and return from the execution thread
